targets.label: current
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT MAX(RunningTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'mavis-$environment' GROUP BY ServiceName

targets.expression:
fields @timestamp
| parse message /Performed (?<job_type>[^ ]*)/
| display @timestamp
| filter ispresent(job_type)
| stats count() as rate by bin(1m),job_type

fields @timestamp
| filter level like /(?i)error/ 
| parse message /performing (?<job_type>[^ ]*)/
| filter ispresent(job_type)
| stats count() as rate by bin(1m),job_type

fields @timestamp, path, remote_addr, user_agent
 | sort @timestamp desc
 | filter ispresent(status)
 | stats count() as rate by bin(1m),status

fields @timestamp
| filter ispresent(path)
| parse path /(?<main_path>\/[^\/]*)/
| stats count() by bin(1m),main_path

fields @timestamp
| filter ispresent(path)
| stats sum(method='GET') as GET,
        sum(method='HEAD') as HEAD,
        sum(method='OPTIONS') as OPTIONS,
        sum(method='TRACE') as TRACE,
        sum(method='PUT') as PUT,
        sum(method='DELETE') as DELETE,
        sum(method='POST') as POST,
        sum(method='PATCH') as PATCH,
        sum(method='CONNECT') as CONNECT
        by bin(1m)

fields @timestamp
| filter ispresent(path)
| filter status like /5/
| stats sum(method='GET') as GET,
        sum(method='HEAD') as HEAD,
        sum(method='OPTIONS') as OPTIONS,
        sum(method='TRACE') as TRACE,
        sum(method='PUT') as PUT,
        sum(method='DELETE') as DELETE,
        sum(method='POST') as POST,
        sum(method='PATCH') as PATCH,
        sum(method='CONNECT') as CONNECT
        by bin(1m)

fields @timestamp
| filter ispresent(path)
| filter status like /5/
| parse path /(?<main_path>\/[^\/]*)/
| stats count() as rate by bin(1m),main_path
